div.p: A frequent requirement is to purge a queue (i.e. delete all the messages on it).
You can use the to view queues, add/remove queues, purge queues or delete/forward individual messages.
Another option is to use to browse the queues and call the purge() method on the QueueViewMBean.
You could also delete the queue via removeQueue(String) or removeTopic(String) methods on the BrokerViewMBean
You can also do it programmatically
